items.sentence: Tom has a compelling reason for avoiding Mary.
Was that the first time that you rode a horse?
I\'m getting pretty tired of your complaining.
Tom spent a lot of time checking his homework.
If everyone likes you, you\'re doing it wrong.
You might want to have someone look into that.
Tom couldn\'t convince Mary to come back home.
Tom and Mary really seem to be hitting it off.
I've told you a thousand times not to do that.
Tom isn't Mary's assistant. He's my assistant.
